issue.title: URL shortener site datayi.cn is blocked
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

3.6.11 (54)

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://datayi.cn/w/a9By0BOo

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, AdGuard Russian filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, AdGuard Social Media filter, AdGuard Annoyances filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. URL shortener service datayi.cn is blocked. E.g. https://datayi.cn/w/a9By0BOo redirects to https://leetcode.com/discuss/study-guide/3458761/Open-to-Registration!-30-Days-of-LC-JavaScript-Challenge/?utm_campaign=Banner2&utm_medium=Banner&utm_source=Banner&gio_link_id=a9By0BOo

2. Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/735878/236588008-d464614a-16e8-4541-af50-c6586217f1fe.png)

</details>


### Privacy

Visit https://www.indiamart.com/ > 2. Search with any product (Ex: Soap) > 3. Open any product from search results. > 4. Scroll down and click on another product. > > You will eventually notice a pop-up asking you to register on the site. The first pop-up can be skipped (skip button available at the bottom-right of the pop-up window). > > 5. Open another couple of product pages and then you will see another similar pop-up asking you to register. This time, it does not allow the user to skip. > > The request is to block this annoying pop-up registration window so that the user can just browse the web site without registration. > > ### Screenshots

issue.title: Breaks downloads at fontshub.pro
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

uBlock Origin 1.49.0

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://fontshub.pro/font/ubuntu-download

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Annoyances filter, EasyList, EasyPrivacy

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

When you click "Download Ubuntu", it opens a new tab. Then you have to wait 45 seconds. After that, before you can activate the download link, you have to hit one of the buttons to share the link or click the text that says "This is too difficult for me, I just want to download." See screenshot. But AdGuard Annoyances hides this, and you are just left wondering why nothing happens. Adding `fontshub.pro#@#.download-share-box` fixed the issue for me.

Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/116532973/235729318-1f119d17-4a9f-4149-9298-7b2646183f7b.png)

</details>


### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition
